title: shyAmaLAmbikE
sahitya:
shyAmaLAmbikE pAhimAm suka saunakAdi vinutE shrutinutE shrI


anupallavi

  hEmalatE vimalE surasEvitE hEmakUTa vAsini suhAsini 
kAmakOTi sundari krshOdari kaumAri OmkAri gauri shrI


caraNam    manda hasita vadanE manda gamanE Ananda vANi mangaLa pradAyini 
madura muraLIgAna vinOdini mahiSAsura mada bhanjani janani
